mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum +1 as rnum , c.course_title , u.user_no , u.user_name , DATE_FORMAT(a.input_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as input_date , DATE_FORMAT(c.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as start_date , DATE_FORMAT(c.expire_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as expire_date FROM application a, course c, user u, (SELECT @rownum:=0) R WHERE a.user_no = u.user_no AND c.seq = a.seq AND cÂ·course_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT ${cri.pageStart}, ${cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(a.app_seq) as TOTAL_COUNT FROM application a LEFT JOIN course c ON a.app_seq = c.course_seq WHERE c.course_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT c.course_seq , a.app_seq , c.course_title , c.course_category , c.course_type , c.course_start_time , c.class_hour , DATE_FORMAT(c.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as start_date , DATE_FORMAT(c.expire_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as expire_date , u.user_no , u.user_name , u.user_email , u.user_phone , u.user_address , DATE_FORMAT(a.input_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as input_date , a.tuition FROM application a LEFT JOIN course c ON a.seq = c.seq LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE a.input_date = #{input_date}
